function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inconsistent findings in the impact of green buildings on occupants' health","Impact":"Misleading information on the health benefits of green buildings","Mitigation":"Conducting more comprehensive and rigorous research studies to validate the health outcomes of green buildings","Technologies":"Advanced data collection and analysis techniques for health assessment","People":"Occupants of green buildings, health professionals, building designers, and policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies, and building industry organizations"},{"Description":"Exposure to toxic heavy metals in green buildings due to the use of fly ash in construction materials","Impact":"Health risks associated with toxic heavy metal exposure","Mitigation":"Implementing strict regulations and standards for the use of fly ash in construction materials, conducting thorough testing and monitoring of indoor air quality","Technologies":"Air quality monitoring systems, material testing technologies","People":"Building occupants, construction material manufacturers","Owner":"Regulatory agencies, construction industry organizations"},{"Description":"Contradictory findings in the impact of green buildings on mental and physical well-being of occupants","Impact":"Inconsistent guidance for building designers, occupants, and policymakers","Mitigation":"Collaboration between researchers, conducting meta-analysis studies to reconcile contradictory findings, and developing standardized health impact assessment criteria for green buildings","Technologies":"Meta-analysis software, standardized health impact assessment tools","People":"Building designers, occupants of green buildings, researchers, policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies, building industry organizations"}]}
